product_name: The North Face Sally Snow Pants - Women's - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Warm, waterproof and durable, these women's snow pants from The North Face also feature streetwear-influenced style that turns heads but still takes care of business on the hill.
short_description: Warm, waterproof and durable, these women's snow pants from The North Face also feature streetwear-influenced style that turns heads but still takes care of business on the hill.
